title: Glamour, Splendor and Color at Hambantota…. A dream comes true!
content: News.lk – By: Sureshika Thilakarathna History repeats itself, they say. At times such repetition happens in a different way. Then it adds a new page into history. Dreams they say at times fade away. But, some dreams they say come to stay. Dreams turned into reality have glamour and splendor. Oh….there was a dream of…
